article.headline: Charlotte 91, UAB 85
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Eddie Basden had 18 points and 11 rebounds and reserve forward Chris Nance scored 11 critical points down the stretch to lead Charlotte to a 91-85 victory over UAB. Point guard Mitchell Baldwin had 17 points and 7 assists to help Charlotte win its eighth game in a row. The 49ers (11-2, 2-0 C-USA) snapped a three-game losing streak to UAB. Nance and guard Brendan Plavich had 16 points each for Charlotte. Nance scored 11 of his points after Curtis Withers, Charlotte's leading scorer, left the game with his fourth foul. That came with 8:55 left to play and Charlotte trailing 66-65. Nance immediately scored on a dunk to put the 49ers in front 67-66. They stayed ahead the rest of the way. Demario Eddins had a game-high 23 points to lead UAB (12-4, 2-1). Donell taylor scored 13 points, and Ronell Taylor and Derrick Broom had 12 each for UAB. Marvett McDonald added 11 points for the Blazers. The loss snapped a 16-game home winning streak for UAB. After Nance's dunk, Charlotte built a seven-point lead with just over seven minutes to play. UAB closed to within 79-78 and had the ball with a chance to take the lead. But Basden tipped the ball away from Eddins and Nance scored on a follow shot for Charlotte. The 49ers had 8-of-10 free throws down the stretch to stay in front.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
